titleStmt.title: A continuation of the curious collection of paintings, &c. by the best masters viz Guido Rheni ... Young Frank will be sold by auction at the Barbadoes Coffee-House in Exchange Alley, over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil, on Thursday the 4th of this instant February, and will be continued the following days. The sale beginning at four of the clock each afternoon.

notesStmt.note: Probably part of a larger work; the first painting listed is numbered 861.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
